My name is Ryan Unruh &
I'm a software developer.

About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do.

Your project is in safe hands

To help you get to know me fast- here are a few fun facts to kick start our relationshhip. Before persuing a career in software development I was a freelance Photographer & Director. I've lived in New York City for 7 years. I've traveled to 17 countries and have met so many amazing people. About 2 years ago I startted playing around with HTML and CSS and quikly realized how much I enjoy developing. After a year of dabbeling I decided to persue learning full time by enrolling in a 3 month Software engineering bootcamp. During boot camp I learned full stack JavaScript.

I am now in search of a company to contribute my learned skills to. I'm highly motivated, creative, and passionate to learn and continue growing. I'm looking for a talented team of engineers to join who I can ask questions and learn best practaces from.

Feel free to contact me if you think I would be a good fit in your company.

Concepting

The creative process is where I thrive. I love brain storming and creating idea boards. I'm a "strong oppinions held lightly" knind of guy.

Visual Design

From photography, creating posters in Illustrator, and building small UI applications- I have an eye for good design and take pleasure in arranging things to look beautiful to the eye.

Interaction

From my freelance career I have always worked directly with the client. This has taught me to be very communitive and set clear expectations as well as stick to deadlines.
